LanguageData.TerrainAffectsMovement: Pawn movement rates apply to terrain?
LanguageData.CO_ImmobilizeCap: Immobilize caravan at {0}x max mass capacity
LanguageData.CO_ImmobilizeCapNote: *Adjusting this will allow a caravan to move even when above max capacity, but at a reduced speed relative to the weight carried.
LanguageData.CO_RoadMultiplierDesc: road movement cost reduction (smaller is faster)
LanguageData.CO_CaravanSpeedFromPawnSpeedDesc: When enabled, the caravan speed is determined by the average speed of all pawns in the caravan. Average move speed for a pawn is 4.6.
LanguageData.CO_SettingsNote: **All settings use default game values unless adjusted. Using the "Reset" button at the bottom will restore the default settings.
LanguageData.CO_ForceNightMoveDesc: Forces the caravan to travel at night instead of resting. Caravan members will not recover rest or joy and may become more susceptable to mental breaks.
